text: Takaw agesɨpin anɨb awl, anɨb anɨb gɨnɨmɨn agesɨpin ak, yokɨp ma agebin. God ayɨp, Klays Jisas ayɨp, ensel aglep ne okok ayɨp kɨli nɨg mɨdelaknɨŋ, nep anɨgɨnɨmɨn takaw awl agebin. Pen bɨnonɨm nak okok sek, bɨ nak okok sek, kɨlop nep gɨtep ma gɨnɨmɨn. Kɨlop gɨpan tek, binɨb okok mɨdupsek kɨlop gɨñɨnɨmɨn.
